  • Method Details

    • savePrivateApp

      public java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long> savePrivateApp​(NewPrivateCustomerAppInfoDto privateApp)
      Description copied from interface: IPrivateAppCommandService
      Create or update an private customer application / private customer application version.

      It is determined if the private customer application already exists based on the playstoreId.
      If the private customer application exists then it is checked if the private customer application data changed.
      If the private customer application data changed then the private customer application is updated and an outbox entry is created with the event type private_application_changed.
      If the private customer application does not exists then the private customer application and private customer application version is created and an outbox entry is created with the event type private_application_added.

      If the private customer application exists then it is checked if the private customer application version already exists in the databases.
      If the private customer application version exists then it is determined if the private customer application version data changed.
      If the private customer application version data changed then the private customer application version is updated.
      If the private customer application data has not changed but the private customer application version data then an outbox entry is created with the event type private_application_version_changed.
      If the private customer application version does not exists then the private customer application version is created.
      If the private customer application data has not changed then an outbox entry is created with the event type private_application_version_added.

      All created outbox entities are published on the private-application topic by the database monitoring service.

      Specified by:
      savePrivateApp in interface IPrivateAppCommandService
      Parameters:
      privateApp - the private customer application and private customer application version data
      Returns:
      the created/updated private customer application id, if the private customer application / private customer application version was successfully added or changed;
      an empty Optional if a required attribute is null in the NewIosAppInfoDto object or nothing is inserted or updated;

    • deletePrivateApp

      public java.lang.Boolean deletePrivateApp​(java.lang.Long appId)
      Description copied from interface: IPrivateAppCommandService
      Deletes the specified private customer application if the application exists.
      Creates an outbox entity to start a new message transfer to exchange the deletion event of the private customer application with other services. This event is published on the private-application topic with the event type private_application_deleted by the database monitoring service.
      Specified by:
      deletePrivateApp in interface IPrivateAppCommandService
      Parameters:
      appId - the private application id
      Returns:
      True if the deletion was successful; False otherwise;

    • handleOutboxEvent

      private void handleOutboxEvent​(OutboxEntity entity)
      Inserts and deletes an outbox entity in the database. The outbox entity is inserted to trigger the creation of an event by the database monitoring service.
      Since the data monitoring service uses the write ahead log to parse the entries, the outbox entries can be deleted after insertion to free the used space.
      Parameters:
      entity - the outbox entity
